response.original_title: Motu Patlu The Superheroes Vs Alien Ghost
response.overview: Motu Patlu and friends are visiting Petersburg where a evil ghost Claudius binds Motu in a agreement and uses him to destroy Romanika, village of good ghosts. It's on Patlu and friends to save Motu from ruining it all.
response.title: Motu Patlu The Superheroes Vs Alien Ghost
